stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Woodlands Transform, Worrying Forest Sages
stories.fantasy_story: The venerable Forest Sages are troubled by changes in the ancient woodlands. A grand study of countless tree kinds shows that the forests grow more uniform. Swift-sprout saplings now dominate, while the slow-growing, long-lived elder trees are sadly disappearing.

stories.original_headline: Why this rust-like mineral is one of Earth’s best carbon vaults
stories.original_summary: A common iron mineral hiding in soil turns out to be far better at trapping carbon than scientists realized. stories.fantasy_headline: Mystic Iron Stone Guards Earth's Dark Vapours!
stories.fantasy_story: Alchemists have discovered a common iron-hued stone hidden in the soil. This humble mineral is much better at sealing away dark vapours than previously thought. Its surface holds tiny, intricate enchantments that bind many different essences, making it a powerful guardian of the earth's magic.

stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Artificers' New Scrying Orb Display Proves a Hoax!
stories.fantasy_story: Whispers spread through the market during the Festival of Champions about a 'leaked' grand display from the Grand Artificers' Guild. It spoke of new mystic earpieces and a glowing scrying orb. However, these tales were soon revealed to be mere trickery, a fabricated prophecy spread by disgruntled apprentices.

stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Tourney to Showcase New Mystic Devices!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Tourney of Champions is almost upon us, with mighty Houses battling for glory. While a renowned Bard will charm the crowds, the merchant displays during intermissions might steal the show. Whispers suggest a wealth of new mystic devices and ancient enchantments will be unveiled, much like the Elven gold wonders of yesteryear.
